usergroup.name: Coding Night
usergroup.description:
Coding Night Frankfurt is an Open event where you're going to write code together with other enthusiasts. It doesn't matter, if you're not a geek or a male or a female. Everyone is welcome to try new things: programming languages, frameworks, programming techniques, libraries, IDEs. We accept Newbies, Novices and Experts.
You will get the chance to experiment without any pressure in a friendly and open environment. It's up to you or your group to decide what you are going to do during a Coding Night. You can simply try out a new small programming library or getting help to tweak your own IDE or work on challenging projects.
